value:
Fine castle you have here. It's not
really my thing to stay cooped up all
day though. Let's get to battling!

The name of my axe is Armads.
It was once wielded by a legendary
berserker, you know.$k$pOnce had a chance to meet the
man, believe it or not. He's one
dangerous-looking fellow.

One of my best friends goes by the
name of Eliwood. We spar for fun.
He even wins half the time!

I'm really bored. How about we
spar for a while? Don't worry.
I'll go easy on you, friend!

Someone once told me that knights
should stand their ground, but that's
really just not my style.

I'm Hector. You must be
$Nu.$k$pI've come to say hello—sent over by
$Nf, in fact!
Whoa! Now that's how to do it!

Good enough. Now if I can only
keep this up.

Bah! I'll lose to Eliwood if I can't
do better.

Now I'll show you what Hector
of Ostia is all about!

I'm Hector, from a realm called Ostia.
But I'm not its ruler. My brother,
Uther, is marquess at the moment.

I'm no poet, friend, so bear with
me here. I have a hard time
putting my thoughts into words.$k$pBut before I joined you, I thought
that as long as I just kept on
swinging in battle...$k$pI'd always come out on top and
bring everyone back from battle,
safe and sound.$k$pThen I noticed how you, as
tactician, see the line between
life and death like no one else.$k$pNot sure why, but that hit me hard.
Anyway, know that I've got your
back—long as you've got mine.
おらっ！
おらぁっ！
うああっ！
Better than I thought!
I don't back down!
Gutsy, aren't you?
Enough chitchat!
Here we go!
Not here!
Heh
You need me for something, friend?
Oho! Feels like you're ready to head out. Me too!
Push your limits—that's what I say. But don't burn yourself out.
How about we spar a bit? What say you?
I know we're all in it together. Just letting you know: I'm ALL in.
So...I'm going to die on the battlefield...
I'd better keep an eye on you. Trouble abounds in battle.
Oho!
All right!
On it!
